document.full_text: a day after a drug paraphernalia citation against him was dismissed, former talk show host montel williams renewed his call for more research into the medical benefits of thc, the active ingredient in marijuana.
document.title: pipe charge dropped, montel williams touts pot as medicine
lines_and_colors: a day after a drug paraphernalia citation against him was dismissed, former talk show host montel williams renewed his call for more research into the medical benefits of thc, the active ingredient in marijuana.
